      • query

        public java.sql.ResultSet query(boolean distinct,
                       java.lang.String table,
                       java.lang.String[] columns,
                       java.lang.String whereClause,
                       java.lang.String[] whereArgs,
                       java.lang.String groupBy,
                       java.lang.String having,
                       java.lang.String orderBy,
                       java.lang.String limit)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Overrides:
        query in class Database
        Parameters:
        distinct - True if only different values shall be retreated. False to ignore this section.
        table - Name of the table to read from.
        columns - Columns to SELECT.
        whereClause - The sql sentence corresponding but not including the WHERE section.
        whereArgs - An array of values that will be put instead of the corresponding ? symbols in the WHERE clause.
        groupBy - The value corresponding to the GROUP BY clause. Null to ignore.
        having - The value corresponding to the HAVING clause. Null to ignore.
        orderBy - The value corresponding to the ORDER BY clause. Null to ignore.
        limit - The value corresponding to the LIMIT clause. Null to ignore. Limits to a fixed number the results.
        Returns:
        Return an object of type ResultSet with the result of the query.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
